a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: Number of recorded natural disaster events, All natural disasters, 1900 to
The number of global reported natural disaster events in any given year. This includes those from drought, floods, extreme
weather, extreme temperature, landslides, dry mass movements, wildfires, volcanic activity and earthquakes.
Source: EMDAT (2020): OFDA/CRED International Disaster Database, Université catholique de Louvain – Brussels – Belgium
